name: fuckyoufriday
text: I'll have to remember that move.

name: deusoma
text: The "one second" thing? Shoot, I've been doing it since I was six.

name: foetus_punch
text: Wait, you've been jerkin' it to some internet porn since you were six?

name: deusoma
text: Okay, maybe not these exact circumstances but the basic idea of actually giving someone one second of your attention. Also, have a chubby for making me laugh in the office.

name: jamers
text: Phew, that made it easier to ignore my roommates in college. Thanks Lyle!

name: mikebox
text: Did anyone else just assume it's Teodore yelling at him?

name: aghbar
text: I pretty much assumed it was Cornelius.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Other people seem to have mentioned this below, but I would guess it's Onstad himself, as it's generally been established that he's the one letting them live in his house.  Also, the disembodied bossy voice "coming from above" is normally Onstad's voice.

name: sealman87
text: Yeah, I always assumed it was Onstad too, since the speech bubble arrow is pointed pretty high. And the concept of Onstad charging them rent is what makes this one for me.

name: rascaldom
text: Well, he's only a webcomicker.

name: st-elmos_fire
text: and they're only stuffed animals

name: robbingdog
text: Oh my god after I read this post I checked the comic to make sure and sure enough, it never actually says it's Teodor.  Goddammit why was I so sure it was him?

name: mangtastic
text: I thought it was Teodor as well, although there is nothing to signify this.  Maybe it is because there is far more Teodor-Lyle interaction than Onstad-Lyle.  Yeah, that's probably why.

name: money4something
text: It's established in one of the hardback books that Lyle, Cornelius, etc. all pay rent to Onstad.

name: varnish
text: Discussing rent or looking at pornagraphic images? Lyle knows what to do.

name: alejandroadam
text:
I HAVE DONE THIS!

plus you never need to talk about rent. you know he won't pay it till the 10th or something.

name: tekende
text: I think that is an optimistic assumption.

name: tinhand
text: It never comes up again, it's just as likely that he was gonna pay it but picked up some whiskey when he was out and took a shit on Onstads bed thinking at the time that it counts as a payment.

name: solobuttons
text:
The alt-text for this is fantastic.
"Lyle absolutely loves pornography."
So true.

name: prettyrad
text: I chubbied this even though I had just read the alt text, and it was the same as the alt text you quoted.

name: ssddr
text: Onstad charges stuffed animals rent? What a dick.

name: blarghamagarky
text: well they use his internet and junk

name: luckypyjamas
text: they don't use his junk

name: doomchild
text:
Lyle's power grows by wiping himself with tortillas . I'm not sure you can confidently say what Lyle does and doesn't do.

DC

name: hendetta
text: I don't think it is just that Lyle loves pornography. He also probably hates rent.

name: spinynorman
text:
Onstad's use of adverbs is really hilarious. Check out the following:

"Man, Philippe really fucked up this time. Cornelius completely hates rap."

"Lyle absolutely loves pornography."

"Todd came back from prison completely addicted to horrible drugs."

I can't read one of those without grinning like an idiot, or like a drug mule whose package ruptures mid-flight and is experiencing the joy of a body absorbing lethal amounts of heroin at a stunning rate.

name: farqussus
text:
There's nothing better than prefixing a binary verb with an adverb.

Especially when it's not in corporate marketing literature.

name: pogo
text: A comment left by pogo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Norsef, farqussus, mediumrare, LRosetw8)

name: tekende
text: Oh wow, "completely pregnant." I love it.

name: thescrivener
text: "completely pregnant" strikes me as a condition that doesn't last very long, like the progress bar of pregnancy slowly filling up over nine months, and then sitting at 100% for nineteen hours of labor before disappearing.

name: pogo
text: Yeah, I see what you mean.  Although I'd say some women are completely pregnant at around 8 months, in that they can no longer walk easily and such.

name: semiquaver
text:
Your new avatar makes me hate you.

No, seriously. Lose the Ray-glasses, human-face.

name: boredom_man
text: Speaking as someone who hates all of the real-face avatars, this still seems a bit over the top...

name: pogo
text: Point taken, and thanks, I certainly meant it to be over the top.

name: pogo
text: ANd of course, when I change it again, this will all makes no sense.

name: boredom_man
text: Actually I meant Semiquiver's rage was overblown. Yours just looks like every other real-face avatar to me. I guess suits are ridiculous, but we all wear pretty ridiculous things, I guess, except Spinynorman who is our standard of normalcy.

name: semiquaver
text:
*descends from a cloud of glowing vapors*

Point taken, and thanks, I certainly meant it to be over the top.

*ascends*

name: heccibiggs
text: Consider me flipping you off.

name: semiquaver
text: I just want to step in here and note that this is in fact my real face.

name: atticusonline
text: Some sort of burger making contraption?

name: selbencoirlo
text:
Man that takes low self esteem to a whole new level.

Ironically, a high level.

name: semiquaver
text: Consider my applause to be already in your ears, though it has in fact been mailed to you from an undisclosed location in Korea and will arrive shortly.

name: cdl146
text: I love how it's "that image" and not "those images." Lyle would rather look at a single pornographic photo all day than discuss rent.

name: doomchild
text:
Maybe it's just the most incredible pornographic image ever created.

DC

name: soticoto
text: It is a slippery slope from "those images" to "these knives". Remember that.

name: terriblerobot
text: ...Boned?

name: soticoto
text: Boo to that.

name: molesticide
text: and he's just LOOKING at it, he isn't really doing anything about it.  he just wants to look.

name: jackparsons
text: Really good porn is like that. And there is so little good porn that Lyle must savor that rarest delicacy.

name: tekende
text: Is best song, played on most beautiful guitar.

name: tellumo
text: by hottest and most talented guitarist.

name: doomchild
text:
Who is so nude.

DC

name: tellumo
text: link

name: dumbeast
text: Chub for on-point xkcd reference

name: tekende
text: No such thing.

name: kolchak
text: The alt text is what really makes this strip.

name: mountaindewtab
text: who was it that actually thought this wasnt a five

name: tekende
text: Hint: Me. It's me.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: also me.

name: soticoto
text:
Also me.

(I gave it a 2)

name: jalapenoenema
text: He looks no older than 13 with that cap on, which just makes it funnier.

name: zedpower
text: If 13 year olds where you live have gigantic mustaches then you should maybe think about having your water inspected is all I'm saying.

name: doomchild
text:
Spoken like a man who hasn't spent much time in Mexico. I've seen nine year olds who looked like brown versions of Tom Selleck. One of them caught me staring and challenged me to a mustache fight.

DC

name: hooves
text: I agree. at first I thought it was a flashback strip and that lyle was simply born with the moustache in the same way that jack nicholson was born balding and philipe was born 5 years old.

name: foetus_punch
text: And Teodor was born with armpit hair. According to my pal LB!

name: tekende
text: And Steve Martin was born with grey hair.

name: theguitarhero
text: That one is actually true. Have you read Born Standing Up yet?

name: tekende
text: I have not. And I was just kidding, so...that's weird.

name: mindbnder
text: Where is Lyle's left hand?  Oh God Where Is IT?!?

name: erix
text: In panels 8 and 10.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: why don't you ask that man with the white windowless van.

name: hyetal
text: I stumble upon this one in Random Mode more often than is statistically likely.

name: fineoakstructure
text: How odd, I've been using random for quite some time and this is the first time I've come across it.

name: baryonyx
text: I hypothesize everyone has a strip they random to more than is statistically likely. For me it's Phileppe's Campaign Platforms .

name: fermatprime
text:
In fact, when you factor in cognitive biases, it's almost certain that there'll be a strip you'll (think you) come across more than is statistically likely!

Science!

name: terribleman
text: Science-chubby

name: blarghamagarky
text: I like Lyle's look today

name: cjfoster
text:
here goes nothin':
i don't get the towel part. somebody 'splain it to me please.

name: fosters
text: It's just the next level of ignoring Onstad and focusing in on the porn. Next step will probably be him turning a cardboard box upside down and dropping it over his head and the monitor.

name: dusty
text: It seems to me that if someone is keeping a towel by the computer, their reason for doing so may also be a reason that you would not want to put it on your head.

name: drago25
text: Towels: the impregnable last wall of defense for porn-fiends

name: milkpants
text: is it a surprise that the towel was nearbye?

name: milkpants
text: i must have been smoking this day

name: charchar
text: Maybe it's because of the parallels (dude living with a bunch of animals), but I always hear Onstad's voice as that of Dave from the original Chipmunks series.

name: theguitarhero
text: Alvin would definitely be the type to look at a pornography all day.

name: mangtastic
text: ALLLLLLLLLVINNNN!!!

name: fuzzery
text: Does Onstad make everyone pay rent?

name: odei
text: Later: Lyle and Candice finally get some privacy.

name: mattylite
text: Anybody else get a sort of a Chipmunks vibe from strips like this, where Onstad (as I presume the disembodied voice to be) interacts with his characters?  The analogy is strongest w/ the non-cat characters: Onstad as Dave, Lyle as Alvin, I guess Cornelius as Simon, and as Theodore, well, how about Teodor?

name: greenkoolayd
text: onstrad, youre arguing with an alive stuffed animal... and letting him WIN.  i think its time to re-evaluate, brah.

name: terribleman
text: Hey, you sass that hoopy Lyle? There's a frood who really knows where his towel is.
